articles.description: Cygames has announced free-to-play digital card game Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond for PC, iOS, and Android. It will launch in summer 2024.
articles.content:
Get the first details below. Game Overview
  • Genre: Competitive online collectible card game
  • Platforms: iOS, Android, PC
  • Price: Free to play (optional in-app purchases)

articles.author: Kate Hull
articles.title: Mark Cuban Takes These 3 Supplements Daily - Business Insider
articles.description: Mark Cuban takes 3 supplements every day: melatonin to help with sleep and vitamins D and E for health benefits like strong bones and anti-aging.
articles.content:
Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban has been going through some changes recently. At the end of November, Cuban announced that he would be wrapping up his decade-long stint on ABC's Shark Tank
